title: Russell dominates as McLaren drivers clash - Singapore GP results
summary: Russell dominates the Singapore Grand Prix as McLaren clinches constructors' title amid controversy

qa_pairs.question: Who won the Singapore Grand Prix?

wrong_options: They both retired from the race.
